## Echo Backend PROD - Uptime Check Failed

### CRITICAL - Production Alert

### Immediate Actions
1. **Check /health endpoint**: `curl -s https://echo-backend-zxuvsjb5qa-ew.a.run.app/health | jq .`
2. **Check /version endpoint**: `curl -s https://echo-backend-zxuvsjb5qa-ew.a.run.app/version | jq .`
3. **Last deploy SHA**: Check `git_sha` from /version response

### Investigation
- [Cloud Run Logs](https://console.cloud.google.com/run/detail/europe-west1/echo-backend/logs?project={{PROJECT_ID}})
- [Uptime Check Details](https://console.cloud.google.com/monitoring/uptime?project={{PROJECT_ID}})

### Escalation
Immediately notify the on-call engineer. Production downtime requires immediate response.
